description:
Overwhelmed?

Well, you're not alone. Lots of people are fed up with clutter and they want to do something about it. They have good intentions, but they never really make any progress. Clutter is costing them money and time and it's affecting their personal and business lives.

But it doesn't have to be that way. You can defeat clutter! 

You can regain focus and clear up space to do what's most important to you. You can get rid of all that junk that gets in your way and focus on your bottom line.

_______________________________________________________________________

You get the motivation and the tools you need to get control of your physical stuff!

_______________________________________________________________________

This course will:

  1. inspire you to do what you know you need to do (get rid of clutter)
  2. give you the tools to get it done
  3. give you a step-by-step plan to follow

It's not just theory or fluff. It's a formula to implement.

_______________________________________________________________________

"This course is fabulous. Much more than I expected, in terms of causing me to think about why I want to declutter and what is important to me." -John (course participant)

_______________________________________________________________________

What's Included?

Video Tutorials covering these topics:

  • The Cost of Clutter
  • The Benefits of “Clutter-Free”
  • Let’s be realistic... Is this even possible?
  • The Process - 6 Steps to Clutter-Free
  • How to Stay Motivated in the Fight Against Clutter

Printable Worksheets so you can fill-in the blanks and take notes while you watch the videos.

BONUS PDFs, including:

  • Declutter Process Cheat Sheet
  • 10 Ways to Fight Clutter When You Have Zero Time
  • A Curfew for the House Party (a motivating metaphor)
  • Decluttering Links & Resources

Printable labels to save you time when you’re ready to get started!

In case you prefer to listen to audio while you're jogging or driving, we've included MP3 versions of the video tutorials AND the Bonus PDFs (so you can listen to them on-the-go).

Seven desktop wallpapers to add a little Declutter Swag to your life! These are nice on the eyes, and they'll motivate you to stay on track.

Also, in Session 4, we include links to over 100 stories of real-life people who are winning in the fight against clutter.


If you get this course will your clutter magically disappear forever? Probably not. 

But will you have a clear plan on how to attack physical clutter wherever it exists? Absolutely.

Will you make huge strides in FINALLY getting rid of the clutter you've been talking about eliminating?

Definitely.


Let's do something about that clutter that's getting in your way, costing you time and money, and hindering you from pursuing your passions!
title: Declutter Any Space At Work or Home
